name: NSLevelIndicator.Style
desc: Constants that specify a level indicator's appearance.

items.name: case relevancy
items.desc: A style that indicates the relevancy of an item, such as a search result.

items.name: case continuousCapacity
items.desc: A style that indicates the capacity of something, such as how much data is on a hard disk.

items.name: case discreteCapacity
items.desc: A style that displays discrete segments that indicate the capacity of something, such as an audio level.

items.name: case rating
items.desc: A style that indicates a rank, such as a star ranking display.
